context: under general orotracheal anesthesia, a crowe-davis mouth gag was inserted and suspended.
tonsils were removed by electrocautery dissection and the tonsillar beds were injected with marcaine 0.25% plain.

a catheter was inserted in the nose and brought out from mouth.
the throat was irrigated with saline.
